diagnostic.Model2Ref#

class Model2Ref(diagnostic_function, visualization_function, name=None, description=None)[source]#

Bases: Diagnostic

A class representing a diagnostic that compares a model to a reference.

__init__(diagnostic_function, visualization_function, name=None, description=None)[source]#

apply(data: Dataset, ref: Dataset, **kwargs)[source]#

Apply the diagnostic to the data.

Parameters:

  • data (xr.Dataset) – The data to apply the diagnostic to.

  • ref (xr.Dataset) – The reference data to compare the data to.

Returns:

The data after applying the diagnostic.

Return type:

xr.Dataset
